stable.releaseNotes: Major update with Designer Mode (Beta), Thinking Budget System, Auto-Fix Problems, Native Git Support, Auto-Update System, and 27+ AI models including Claude 3.5 Haiku and Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite for free!
